titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7677

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 26 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: State --
I Have issd. & delivered the following Commissions viz:

Frank B. Tucker 2nd Lieut: Adjutant date Aug 26. 1862
John R. Featherston 2d. Leiut: " " " "
Jeremiah Redfean 1 Lieut " " July 29 -- "
Joseph D. Yonts 1 Lieut " Aug 12 -- "
Henry C. Morgan 2 Lieut " July 29 -- "
Jesse S. Hill 2 Lieut " Aug 12 -- "
Curran G. Neel 1 Lieut " " " 11 -- "
Richard D. Cunningham 2 Lieut " " 26 -- "
James L. Hardin 2 Lieut " " 15 -- "
Thomas M. Likes 1 Lieut " -- " -- 6 -- "
John N. McIntire 2 Lieut " -- " " -- "
Marcus E. Poynter asst. Surg " May 27. -- "
Daniel F. Winchester 2 Lieut " Jany 24. -- "
Fountaine Goodpaster Capt " May 30, -- "
John Joyce 1 Lieut " -- " -- " -- "
Julius C. Miller 2 Lieut " -- " -- " -- "
Louis Constans 2 Lieut " Aug 26 -- "
John W. Grose 2 Lieut " -- " 20 -- " --
Charles L. White 1 Lieut " -- " 10 -- " --
Alexander C. Lakin 2 Lieut " -- " -- June 13 -- " --
L. L. Drown 1 Lieut " " " 20 -- " --
A. A. Gillette 2 Lieut " " " " " --
Ernest Vincillott 2 Lieut: Com. dated July 13, 1862.

Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken. Vols:
